title: 208-Maui: Big Tuna
itunes:title: 208-Maui: Big Tuna
description:
What do you do after you hook the sun, dredge up islands for humanity, and bring fire to the world? How about settle down with a nice goddess, have some kids, and enjoy the simple life. Nevermind that your new spouse's evil ex is on the way...and he's a vicious, monstrous eel. You have nothing to worry about! You're Maui! You have a...fishhook? Ok maybe you do have something to worry about.

The creature is the family tension that leads to you turning someone into a vicious, blood-thirsty firefly.

The site: https://www.mythpodcast.com

The store: https://myths.link/store

The membership: https://myths.link/membership

--

Simplisafe: Get a free security camera and a risk-free 60-day free trial at http://simplisafe.com/legends

AcornTV: Check it out and get 30 days(!) free at http://acorn.tv code LEGENDS

--

Music:

"Douglas Stairs" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Nuthatch" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Ewa Valley" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Flattered" by Blue Dot Sessions
